Articles.Content: Hi!,im new here i am Guilliano but you can call me Guill! and i'm energetic and of course i love to play Kerbal Space Program A LOT but anyways i will learn more here ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).
I am old here. I am Vanamonde, and you can call me Vanamonde. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I'm sluggish and play a lot of KSP.
I am not as new here, but not as old here. I am Dman979, known to many as dman, Dman, and dee man (but not damn:)) I'm a quick thinker and love to help people out.
